title.en: A Lifetime of the Long March

publisher.en: Hunan Literature and Art Publishing House

description.zh: 《一生的长征》是彭东明创作的长篇纪实文学作品，以喻杰为主人公，讲述了他从副部级官员退下来后，主动回到家乡平江山区，投身扶贫济困、为民造福的感人故事。
description.en: A long-form documentary novel by Peng Dongming, 'A Lifetime of the Long March' tells the touching story of Yu Jie, who, after retiring from a vice-ministerial position, voluntarily returned to his hometown in Pingjiang to engage in poverty alleviation and serve the people.

description.zh: 《芙蓉镇》是沈从文创作的长篇小说，以20世纪30年代的湘西小镇芙蓉镇为背景，讲述了主人公“我”与镇上居民之间的故事。小说通过细腻的笔触，展现了湘西人民的生活风貌和人情世故，同时也反映了社会变革对个体命运的影响。
description.en: Furong Town is a long novel by Shen Congwen, set in the 1930s in the small town of Furong in western Hunan. It tells the story of the protagonist 'I' and the residents of the town. Through delicate writing, the novel showcases the lifestyle and human affairs of the people in western Hunan, while also reflecting the impact of social changes on individual destinies.

description.zh: 《边城》以20世纪30年代川湘交界的边城小镇茶峒为背景，讲述了船家少女翠翠与船总的两位儿子天保和傩送之间的爱情故事。小说通过细腻的笔触，展现了湘西人民的生活风貌和人情世故，同时也反映了社会变革对个体命运的影响。
description.en: Set in the 1930s at the border town of Chazhong in western Hunan, 'Border Town' tells the love story between the ferryman's granddaughter Cui Cui and the two sons of the boat captain, Tianbao and Nuo Song. The novel delicately portrays the life and customs of the local people and reflects the impact of social changes on individual destinies.
